data.title: FIU College of Engineering and Computing
data.meta_description: The FIU College of Engineering and Computing is committed to serve our students, enrich their lives and help them pursue their dreams.
data.meta_site_name: FIU College of Engineering and Computing
data.text:
NEWS

New senior appointees bring AI experience, leadership to helm of College of Engineering and Computing

Interim Dean Inés R. Triay has promoted Professors Mark Weiss and Christian Poellabauer to new administrative positions, bringing decades of experience in research, education and artificial intelligence innovation to the top levels of FIU’s College of Engineering and Computing (CEC).

STUDENT RESOURCES

Create, Innovate, Collaborate

Discover FIU’s MakerSpace [EC1461]—a dynamic environment where students can work on homework, lab assignments, and collaborative projects with cutting-edge tools and resources.

NEWS

FIU offers new degree to give graduates a competitive edge in AI

Florida International University is launching a bachelor’s degree in data science and artificial intelligence to strategically position students for success in the evolving technology landscape.

NEWS

The Knight Foundation School of Computing and Information Sciences’ new Bachelor of Science in Data Science and Artificial Intelligence launches in the fall of 2024.

FROM THE DEAN'S DESK

Ready for tomorrow.

Ushering in solutions for the next era of global challenges.

NEWS

Dr. Jorge Riera has been elected to join the American Institute for Medical and Biological Engineering (AIMBE) College of Fellows.

Associate professor and interim chair of the Department of Biomedical Engineering Jorge Riera has been elected to join the American Institute for Medical and Biological Engineering (AIMBE) College of Fellows. Riera is being recognized for his outstanding contributions in advancing the technology of functional magnetic resonance imaging in combination with electroencephalogram (EEGfMRI).

RANKINGS

Wall Street Journal ranks FIU No. 4 best public university, No. 29 overall.

WELCOME TO THE

College of Engineering & Computing

As the research engine of the university, our mission is to reach preeminence in the classroom, laboratory and industry. With this in mind, we are pursuing innovations in education, research that is interdisciplinary and leads to entrepreneurial pursuits, and stronger community and industry engagement. We are offering new degrees and programs that will prepare our students for jobs of the future. We are expanding our outreach in the community and engaging with our partners and alumni in the industry to promote FIU engineering across the nation and to enhance post-graduation opportunities for our students.

Learn about CEC’s Vision >

Student Spotlight

Meet McNair Scholar and B.S. Mechanical Engineering student, Matty Sey.

Sey hopes to pursue a career in developing and advancing the next generation of nanomaterials that can change people’s lives for the better.

Faculty Highlight

Ransomware can hide in the websites you upload files to

When it comes to protecting your computer, the danger is not only in what you download; it’s also in what you upload, says FIU study lead by principal investigator, Knight Foundation School of Computing and Information Sciences professor Selcuk Uluagac.
